code:
%% Git Branching Strategy Diagram
%% Shows: main branch, feature branches, merging

gitGraph
    commit id: "Initial commit"
    commit id: "Add HTML structure"
    commit id: "Add CSS styling"
    
    branch feature-navbar
    checkout feature-navbar
    commit id: "Create navbar HTML"
    commit id: "Style navbar"
    commit id: "Add mobile menu"
    
    checkout main
    branch feature-footer
    checkout feature-footer
    commit id: "Create footer"
    commit id: "Style footer"
    
    checkout main
    merge feature-navbar tag: "v1.1"
    commit id: "Update README"
    
    checkout feature-footer
    commit id: "Add social links"
    
    checkout main
    merge feature-footer tag: "v1.2"
    commit id: "Final polish"

%% Alternative text description:
%% 
%% main branch (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode):
%%   ├─ Initial commit
%%   ├─ Add HTML structure
%%   ├─ Add CSS styling
%%   │
%%   ├─ feature-navbar branch (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic):
%%   │  ├─ Create navbar HTML
%%   │  ├─ Style navbar
%%   │  └─ Add mobile menu
%%   │  └─ (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) v1.1
%%   │
%%   ├─ feature-footer branch (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic):
%%   │  ├─ Create footer
%%   │  ├─ Style footer
%%   │  ├─ Add social links
%%   │  └─ (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) v1.2
%%   │
%%   └─ Final polish

%% Usage: mermaid-cli
%% Export: mmdc -i 02-branching-strategy.mmd -o ../diagrams/branching-strategy.png

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode 和 IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 这一块。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode处理。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode处理'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic 的逻辑。
等等，我重新想了一下，应该是 IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic处理 才对。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic处理'，你看看合适吗？
